word_mean: 将河底泥沙搅松的专用机具。如铰刀、斗轮铰刀、耙头、高压冲水器等。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (denoting a delegate of private soldiers in the Parliamentary army during the English Civil War): from Latin, from agitare (see agitate) Sense 1dates from the mid 18th cent

entry.def: If you describe someone involved in politics as an agitator, you disapprove of them because of the trouble they cause in organizing campaigns and protests.

example.ex: ...a famous actress who was accused of being a political agitator.
example.tran: 被指控为政治煽动者的著名女演员

means.word_mean: 1. one who agitates; a political troublemaker

stems_affixes.word_buile: ag做,代理做+ile……的→能做的→灵活的
ag做,代理做+ency状态;机构→代理机构
ag做,代理做+enda表示复数→做的事情→议程
ag做,代理做+ent……人→做的人→代理人;作用因素
agile[adj.灵活的,敏捷的]+ity性质,特性→n.敏捷, 活泼
agitate[v.鼓动;搅动]+ion动作或状态→n.鼓动,煽动
co共同+agent[n.作用因素;代理人]→共同做的人
counter反+agent作用因素→反作用→反抗力
re再+agent作用→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂
ag做,代理做+it+ate表动作→反复作→鼓动
